Attributes.description: Design of municipal infrastructure, including streets, water supply networks, and sewers, garbage collection and solid waste management. Focus is on solutions for providing an adequate water supply, collecting and disposing of stormwater and sewage, and managing excess stormwater flow.
Attributes.date_buildings: Term: 2, Days: Mon Wed Fri, Start Time: 14:00, End Time: 15:00, Building: Biological, Room: Sciences
